[ARC Raiders](https://www.ign.com/games/arc-raiders)

# 'What the Duck Is This?' — Arc Raiders Duplication Glitch has Players Running Into Hoarders With Hundreds of Squeaky Bath Toys

## Paying the bills.

![Michael Cripe Avatar](https://assets-prd.ignimgs.com/avatars/5205bf6a08586a205a834928/Michael_blue_red_2-1700460435246.png?crop=1%3A1&width=21&format=jpg&auto=webp&quality=80)

By [Michael Cripe](https://www.ign.com/person/MikeCripe)

Updated: Jan 31, 2026 4:16am EST

[2 comments](https://www.ign.com/articles/what-the-duck-is-this-arc-raiders-duplication-glitch-has-players-running-into-hoarders-with-hundreds-of-squeaky-bath-toys#comments)

A new [Arc Raiders](https://www.ign.com/games/arc-raiders) duplication glitch has fans worried about exploits, but others just want to know why it’s being used to spawn mountains of rubber duck trinkets.

The [Headwinds update](https://www.ign.com/articles/the-first-big-arc-raiders-update-of-2026-adds-solo-vs-squads-matchmaking-bird-city-and-more-tomorrow) brought new content, alongside fresh gameplay tweaks, when it launched for Arc Raiders players across PC, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X \| S earlier this week. While the 40+ level matchmaking option, Solo vs. Squads, was positioned by developer Embark Studios to be its big selling point, some players are more concerned with the return of an item duplication exploit and how it has affected the in-game (duck) economy.

> [WHAT THE DUCK IS THIS????? We found two dead raiders with absolutely nothing but full stacks of ducks???](https://www.reddit.com/r/ArcRaiders/comments/1qmdxju/what_the_duck_is_this_we_found_two_dead_raiders/)
>
>  by [u/granto](https://www.reddit.com/user/granto/) in [ArcRaiders](https://www.reddit.com/r/ArcRaiders/)

Although players are [no doubt](https://www.reddit.com/r/ArcRaiders/comments/1qqb1oq/evidence_of_a_bp_duplication_glitch_in_matches_we/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web3x&utm_name=web3xcss&utm_ter
